entry.title: 3M 665 - Scotch Double Coated Tape, 665, 0.75 in x 36 Yd (1.9 cm x 33 m), 665 7000125291
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 11.83

[shortdesc]

Scotch Double Coated Tape, 665, 0.75 in x 36 yd (1.9 cm x 33 m), boxed

  • Scotch® Double Sided Tape is the perfect no-mess alternative to glue
  • Whether you’re arranging photos in your scrapbook, putting the final touches on a school project or mounting notices or lists, this double-sided tape offers a clean, long-lasting way to ensure that everything stays in place
  • The tape glides off the roll smoothly without need for a liner and cuts cleanly right where you want it to
  • So when you’re looking for a hassle-free alternative to drips, clogs and bubbles, look to Scotch® Double-Sided Tape to take care of those projects that need to come together just right.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country United States

    Product Information

  • No-mess, hassle-free alternative to glue
  • Both sides of tape coated with a permanent adhesive
  • Glides off roll smoothly and cuts cleanly and easily
  • Invisible when applied
  • Photo-safe for colour photos
  • Does not yellow or dry out over time
  • Tape comes in a box - no dispenser included
    		•

entry.title: 3M Scotch 600-12BXD - Premium Transparent Film Tape 600 in Clear (1/2 Inchx 36 Yards) - boxed 7000125194
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: Film Tapes
Price: 2.87

[shortdesc]

Scotch Transparent Tape, 600, 12.7 mm x 33 m (1/2 in x 36 yd), boxed

  • When you have a million and one things to do, Scotch® Transparent Tape can help you take on the everyday jobs
  • Glossy and transparent, this tape glides off the roll and holds strong, making it ideal for wrapping packages, sealing envelopes, or repairing rips and tears
  • So whether you’re at home, school, or the office, reach for Scotch® Transparent Tape to help you hold it together.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Length 36yds
    Width 1/2 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Film Tapes

    Product Information

  • Classic glossy-finish tape disappears when applied
  • Glides off the roll smoothly and cuts easily
  • Holds strong, even on glossy surfaces
  • Photo-safe for colour photos
  • Resists yellowing, splitting and drying
  • Moisture- and stain-resistant
  • Tape comes in a box - no dispenser included
  • Fits dispensers with a 1 in (2.5 cm) core

entry.title: 3M Scotch 810-12BXD - Magic Invisible Tape 810 (0.5 Inch x 36 Yards) 7000125301
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type: General Purpose Tape
Price: 2.73

[shortdesc]

Scotch Magic Tape, 810-12BXD, boxed, 1/2 in x 36 yd (12 mm x 32.9 m), 12 per pack

  • Scotch® Magic™ Tape is the original matte finish tape popular in countless homes, schools, and offices
  • Why? Because it works like magic – apply it and it disappears! Frosty on the roll but invisible on paper, this general-purpose tape is great for wrapping, sealing, or mending
  • It won’t show on notepads, documents, or craft paper, and you can even write on it with pen, pencil, or marker
  • This tape is also photo-safe so you can use it wherever you are – at home, in the classroom, or at the office.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Line Scotch
    Color Clear
    Length 36yds
    Width 1/2 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type General Purpose Tape

    Product Information

  • Original matte-finish tape preferred in homes, schools and offices
  • Invisible when applied
  • Write on it with pen, pencil or marker
  • Photo-safe for colour photos
  • Glides off roll smoothly and cuts cleanly and easily
  • Resists moisture, yellowing and splitting
  • Tape comes in a box - no dispenser included

Price: 1.48

3M Highland Clear Tape, 500, 12 mm x 33 m

  • 3M™ Highland™ Clear Tape is an economical office tape with a glossy finish
  • Durable and invisible when applied, this tape is great for a variety of general office tasks such as sealing envelopes, mending paper rips and tears, and mounting notices
  • This tape comes boxed and does not include a dispenser.
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Color Clear
    Length 33m
    Width 12mm
    Origin Country Taiwan
    Product Type General Use Tape

    Extra Product Information

  • 3M™ Highland™ Clear Tape is a transparent tape with a glossy finish that is versatile, being used for a variety of tasks including sealing, holding, mending and general office use
  • The tape is durable and long-aging and fits one inch core dispensers.

  • Durable and invisible when applied
  • Great for sealing, mending and mounting

    Width 1 Inch
    Origin Country United States
    Product Type Cellophane Tapes

  • It offers good performance over broad temperature range
  • This The Scotch®

  • Transparent tape
  • Ideal for packaging applications
  • Adheres to wide variety of surfaces
  • Good performance over broad temperature range
  • Dispenses easily for convenient use
